"Oh? Oh my!!": "Huh?- Uwaaaah! You scared me!"
"Fufufu~ There's no need to be scared, I'm a fully-fledged ARKS, you know?"
"No offense, but whether you're ARKS or not, I'm pretty sure anyone would be surprised to find someone standing right behind them."

"If I was in your position,
I'd shoot them right away."

"Fufufu~ Such a naive reaction, feels so fresh. Is she your new friend?"
"1. I want you to get along with her."

"Well, I don't know what others think, though."
"Well, of course. Even if it's 2 years, or 100 years, even. No matter how much time goes by, people don't change that easily."
"And who are you, young lady?"

"I'm not asking for your name. WHO ARE YOU?"
"Umm... That's-"

"Well, regardless of who you are,
if you're <%me>'s acquaintance, then

let's go shoot each other~ What do you say?"

"Shooting each other...?
